WRITING.TEXT: So as we know Nicky and Elladine are supposed to be this cute power couple but it just does not feel realistic. Or even Noah and Hope at the beginning we got to see them interact all the time and you could genuinely tell they were into each other at least at the beginning. But Elladine and Nicky fail in all catergories they barely interact with eachother or do coupley things together. But the game tries to convince us that they are so good together and the things they do together like massaging eachothers feet we have to hear from Seb. And their speeches for eachother are literally not heartfelt at all and just feel plain and not like a actual power couple. And theese tewo still have not faced any struggles with each other. All I am saying is that they don't feel real but what do you guys think about Nicky snd Elladine?

WRITING.TITLE: A pattern with female li's
WRITING.TEXT: So In the past 2 seasons there has been a pattern that I have noticed with the female Li's. 1. First off the main female li is always in friendship couples if not with mc as both Talia and Marisol were in friendship couples and AJ and Yasmin are following suit as if you are not with them they are both in friendship couples. 2. The female li disappears if not with them as both Talia and Marisol just kind of disappears if not with them by the end and I hope AJ and Yasmin don't follow the same route but I can already see signs of that for Yasmin as she has been progressivelly less featured. 3. Both find love in the end as both Marisol and Talia if not on their route find love by the very end of the game with Graham and Miles/Jasper now we don't really know if Yasmin and AJ will find love by the end but maybe they will end up together idk. Just noticed these patterns and wanted to share it do you think AJ and Yasmin will get their happy ending if not with them.

WRITING.TITLE: Just some random opinions
WRITING.TEXT: 1. The ice dancers and Scott were the best villians as I felt like they were the most well rounded with not always succeeding and being funny. Heather and Alejandro are fine but Heather's plot armor and Alejandro barley facing any struggles turns me off of them. 2. World tour is a little overated (prepares for hate) I just think it was not as good as everyone says it is as I found myself losing interest int the later episodes. I don't hate it I just don't see the hype. 3. The Pahkitew cast should have been saved for some fan vs favorites season with half of the Pahkitew cast I would pick Topher, Ella, Shawn, Jasmine, Dave, Scarlett, and Max as I feel as those characters would add the most to a season. 4. All stars was Courtney's best season after island mostly due to Scott but he helped round her out I know Sundae muddy Sundae was bad but besides that Courtney was decent. 5. I think in ridonculous race the the haters should have went sixth and then just get back together in the end of the episode, the best friends have the same elimination at 5th, and the ice dancers go 4th, and the sisters, cadets, and surfer dudes all have alternate endings where they win. It would have been different and I really just want the sisters to get a win. 6. This is not really an opinion but why do people dislike Carrie I mean yeah she is bland but I never minded her. 7. Amy's mole fits her skin complexion better which makes her look better then Sammy or maybe it is just all of Amy's face expressions. 8. I think all 24 Gen 1 campers should have been in dramarama they don't all need voice actors but the main characters can have them. So characters like Justin, Eva, Katie, Sadie, Katie, Tyler, and Ezekiel don't need voice actors but can just follow the group and stay in the background. Ok that's all I have

WRITING.TITLE: Some unpopular (and maybe popular) opinions
WRITING.TEXT: I have started to dislike Bobby and Chelsea more. They have become more annoying. And I dislike when the islanders baby Bobby and when Chelsea wants your li then drops them and gossips. I don't hate them but I don't like them as much. -Elijah is so underrated he is not pushy and cares for mc. And villa Elijah is really good and like Arjun does not have a lot of character change unlike Carl and Kassam. -I can count on one hand all of the season 3 islanders I like AJ, Seb, Genevive, Cieran, and maybe Tai. They all are really good and deserve a better season for their characters. And I feel like they all have somewhat of a personality and Genevive and Seb have already interacted more than Elladine and Nicky. The rest of the islanders are unlikable or just plain boring and are not getting enough development to build of them being boring. And if your a Harry, Camillo, or Bill stan be one that is fine but in my opinion theese are the only decent characters. Hope did nothing wrong like we all attack Lily/Lucy/Rafi when they try to flirt but when Hope attacks mc for flirting with Noah she gets attacked. And honestly I feel bad for her she had to deal with Noah's indecisiveness, gets cheated on before the final, and gets broken up with after already losing. And she also apologised already for her actions. I do think she had her bad moments but if you are nice to her she is fine. Lottie and Kassam and Priya and Felix should have ended up together now hear me out. Lottie and Kassam could have been such a great pairing Kassam would be fiercely loyal and Lottie would like that. And now with Priya and Felix, I know Felix is not the most popular but Priya gains more confidence with him and Felix was the first guy that showed intrest in Priya besides Ibrahim who gets his head turned everytime some new girl comes in. Okay those are my unpopular opinions or popular opinions what do you think about them and feel free to say some of yours

The text: Seb and Gen and Mc and Li you have both tied so none or of you are getting the money. Gen: aw that's fine I am just happy I met you guys. Li: yeah friendship over money any day bro. Seb: yeah I love you guys. Gen: group hug. Mc: No. I did not wait like 12 weeks to get a friendship is magic ending. Li: come on babe chill out. MC: you know what I am never coming back to this season ever again. Seb: but aren't you gonna miss us. Mc: no, what I am gonna miss is that 50k that I didn't make. Fusebox: but that was such a plot twist right. Mc: whatever I'm going to hangout with Blake. Li: but don't you hate her. Mc: at least she has a dash of personality also call me Seb. I don't know why I did this but I did.

WRITING.TITLE: Headcanons about Td characters part 3: Heather
WRITING.TEXT: Heather is not that close to most to the cast she only really talks to Sierra and Cody She now owns a talkshow in la where she interviews famous people and has gotten old td contestants like Izzy,Owen and Noah to share gossip. Heather is the youngest in her family and has always been spoiled by her mom who is a pushover and her dad just does not care for her behavior. She was the popular girl of her school obviously and didnt think she was doing anything wrong with being rude but when she came back home for action she realised the world hated her which led to major cyber bullying she had to go through. After the show Heather only had one boyfriend who was using her so she is off boys now. She despises both Chris and Ezekiel for taking her money and putting her through torture. Even though she did not show it she liked being friends with Beth and Lindsay because they were just nice people not like the mean girls she hung out with all the time. She is very competitive and it started with Ballet one of her biggest passions in life. She is not as rude anymore but still has moments where she can be self centered. Her and Alejandro sometimes talk but not much after they both lived too far from one another. Had temper tantrums when she was little which led to shock therapy. She finally says that she hated the show but without she would not be where she is today even though she still hates Chris.

WRITING.TITLE: Headcanons about Td characters 4: Duncan
WRITING.TEXT: Duncans parents never approved of his deliquent ways and were super strict which id why he became a delinquent. He got arrested for shoplifting with his friends which before that he had already done more crimes before that. His weakness are girls and he has gotten with all the girls at his school as he would call them too easy. Which is why he was interested in Courtney who was not all for him. He is good with most of the cast like DJ,Geoff, Owen and Bridgette being the ones who he keeps in contact with most. He still likes Courtney and Gwen but he thinks him and Gwen are better as friends and they have talked and they are on ok terms. He has a hate for the so called pretty boys and he usually bullies them or is rude to them. He never actually thought him and Heather would be a couple he was only physically attracted to her. Duncan semi regrets his bullying but for the most part he thinks he helped Harold become less of a dimwit. He actually likes gen 2 a lot he doesn't really keep in contact with them but he liked Jo,Scott,and Zoey as people and wishes he could have gotten more time to know them. Duncan has been bailed out of jail from his parents who are police officers and now lives a chill life with a podcast where he invites some friends which is doing pretty well and continues to travel the world on that motorcycle.

WRITING.TEXT: Talks to most of the cast especially Gwen,Bridgette,Lindsay, Trent and DJ She is with Harold and they are married now her family and friends make fun of her for it but she is happy and that is all that matters to her. She grew up in a big family with tons of siblings for her to count in a big city. Her and Tyler had a reunion where they competed in season 2 of RR they got 5th place and are now closer than ever. Her favorite contestant from another gen is Jasmine as she likes her leadership and sees her as someone she would be friends with in real life. Leshawna is great at cheering people up and does not care what she has to do to do it. Leshawnas biggest pet peeves are rude people ranging from bullies to stuck up. She won the award fom the public that she was the best camper of the season for island. She regrets trusting AleJandro and envys him now. Her and Heather have talked after the show on one of Heather's talk show episodes where they seemed to have resolved everything. Now Leshawna lives in a regular home with Harold as a top fitness instructor who likes to distance herself from total drama and is happy with where she is in her life and no one is going to bring her down. WRITING.TITLE: Headcanons about TD characters 6: Geoff
WRITING.TEXT: He keeps in touch with almost everyone from the show. Him and Bridgette are Married with a kid where they had a wedding on the beach with family and past td campers being present. Geoff is closest with DJ from the og guys and they are still best buddies. He has stayed away from Hollywood and fame as he says it turned him into a toxic person. Brody and Geoff have known eachother since middle school and bonded over there chill attitudes. He was present at every wedding that gen 1 has had and actually created the theme for Harold and Leshawnas wedding where he picked hip hop. He proposed to Bridgette when they were surfing with a bunch of family,friends, and strangers celebrating with them. One of his favorite things to do is traveling and has been to 4 continents. He was on Duncans podcast where they caught up about everything and share their experience. The show did not show it but him and Tyler were actually fast friends while Tyler was on the show. Everyone has said he is the nicest guy ever even Heather. Now Geoff is a pro surfer living a normal life with Bridgette and his kid named Sabrina always looking on the upside of life and can not wait for his next journey.

WRITING.TITLE: Head canons about total drama characters 10/11: Bridgette and Trent 2 in 1
WRITING.TEXT: Bridgette Bridgette found her love for surfing at a ver young age as her mom and dad were also surfers back in the day and taught her how to surf she her very own surfboard when 8. Many guys considered her the cool chick and she had many boyfriends before the show they all ended up breaking up though for her seeing them more as friends than boyfriends. Bridgette had a little bit of a falling out with Courtney and Gwen but has since reunited with them and she is still and was always close to Leshawna. After the show Bridgette got a record deal for her singing she had album that was successful but she atopped aince it was not her passion Her and Geoff got married and had a lid pretty quickly when they were 20 they got married and at 24 they had a kid. Bridgette is a pro surfer like Geoff but is mostly a stay at home mother with her daughter Sabrina it saddens her sometimes that she can not do her passion but she loves Sabrina and is happy that she has what she has and is thankful for everything she has in life. Trent He has been mostly distanced himself from total drama he has not been able to be super close to most of the cast after action only really talking with the drama bros and Leshawna and Owen. He had dated many girls before and after the show but has stayed single as he has said none of those girls were really deep enough for him so he has remained single. He made a drama bros reunion where they all got together and made one last album together. He still follows Gwen on social media they have not interacted too much but if Rrent ever got to see Gwen again he qould do it in a heartbeat. On a lighter note Trent is now touring the world with singles after singles with tons of fangirls and twitter followers Trent is touring the world with his guitar in hand
